name: Ultimate Ears WONDERBOOM 2 - Speaker - for portable use - wireless - Bluetooth - bermuda blue | Dell USA
description: Ultimate Ears WONDERBOOM 2 is a super portable speaker that rocks a surprisingly big sound - anywhere. Heading outside? Hit the all-new Outdoor Boost for louder, crisper audio that's specially tuned for outdoor listening. With 13 hours of battery life, it'll rage 'till dawn. It's got a rating of IP67, so it's super waterproof. And dustproof. And it floats. Plus, you can wirelessly pair two WONDERBOOM 2 speakers for an even bigger stereo or mono sound. It's your shower buddy, your beach volleyball captain, and the
